posts.description: Thanks to the new features in the latest update to the Aurelia router, building a beautiful and functional master-detail page in Aurelia is quick and easy.

posts.name: Aurelia 2018 Roadmap
posts.description: 2017 was a great year for Aurelia but 2018 is shaping up to be even better!

posts.name: Aurelia Release Notes - December 2017
posts.description: 2017 is almost at an end. So, we wanted to close out this year with another set of releases to Aurelia, its plugins and tools. Below you can read the details on the bug fixes, performance improvements and new features available in the latest libraries.

posts.name: Aurelia OpenID Connect
posts.description: This week we invite Aurelia community member, Shaun Luttin [https://github.com/shaunluttin], to share with us a bit about the Aurelia OpenID connect plugin he's been working on. Take it away Shaun...

posts.name: Aurelia Framework7
posts.description: Thanks to the investigative work of one of our community members, Andy [https://github.com/weoreference], we've got another great Aurelia component framework to share with you: Aurelia-Framework7. Read on to learn more, directly from Alexander Flenniken [https://github.com/alflennik], the creator of this project...

posts.name: Aurelia UX Overhaul
posts.description: We've been doing some major work on Aurelia UX, both in terms of building out components and refining the core capabilities and approach. In this post, we'd like to share a bit about the details of our most recent set of releases.

posts.name: Projects That Make Aurelia Shine
posts.description: This week, Aurelia community member and author, Sean Hunter, shares a section from his book "Aurelia in Action".
